attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Stop the slaughter stop abusing animals. Stop kentucky fried cruelty. Do you know what they do there at their slaughter houses. They stomp onthe chickens cut off their beaks feed them to much so they cant stand and much more. It is so cruel so please help put them out of buiness by signing this petition. Thankyou.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
False or incomplete name or address information
